Table of Contents

Class RawCachingGlyphStore

Namespace
osu.Framework.IO.Stores
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A glyph store which caches font sprite sheets as raw pixels to disk on first use.

public class RawCachingGlyphStore : GlyphStore, IResourceStore<TextureUpload>, IGlyphStore, IResourceStore<CharacterGlyph>, IDisposable

Remarks

This results in memory efficient lookups with good performance on solid state backed devices. Consider TimedExpiryGlyphStore if disk IO is limited and memory usage is not an issue.
